Apply leak prevention ointment.sentence: The nurse prepares the skin by cleaning the area with antiseptic wipes.
Apply leak prevention ointment.subject: The nurse

Apply leak prevention ointment.sentence: The nurse applies a thin layer of leak prevention ointment to the cleaned area.
Apply leak prevention ointment.subject: The nurse
Apply leak prevention ointment.object: a thin layer of leak prevention ointment

Apply leak prevention ointment.sentence: The nurse gently massages the ointment into the skin to ensure even coverage.
Apply leak prevention ointment.subject: The nurse

Apply leak prevention ointment.sentence: The nurse monitors the area for any immediate reactions after application.
Apply leak prevention ointment.subject: The nurse

Apply leak prevention ointment.sentence: The nurse educates the patient about the importance of avoiding moisture on the treated area.
Apply leak prevention ointment.subject: The nurse
